desc_content.paragraph: Identifier of operator to call on input event
Is this keymap item user defined (doesn’t just replace a builtin item)
Is this keymap item modified by the user
Regular key pressed as a modifier
Name of operator (translated) to call on input event
Properties to set when the operator is called
The value this event translates to in a modal keymap
Show key map event and property details in the user interface

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
